title: What is the meaning of class 12th appearing students? - Quora

response.answer_text: It means u can apply for various entrance examinations if u are currently pursuing your class 12th or if u r presently studying your 12th u can apply for those Exams which needed to have 12 appearing students . For example joint entrance exam (jee) for engineering , appearing students of class 12th can also fill form and give exam . Hope this helps

If you are currently in class 12th it means you will or ‘appear’ for your 12th Board Exams. This is why you are called ‘appearing student’. For example, Rahul is currently in 12th standard and will give the 12th Board exam. So Rahul is an appearing student. Rahul is also eligible to give major exams like JEE, NEET, NDA, CLAT etc. Don’t hesitate to ask questions. You can message on Quora.
